name: Pastelpunk
description:
Be the last spark of hope and rescue the pastel-colored cyberpunk city from the virus infected robots once and for all! 

As their final act of greed the rich corporations have spread a virus among the city’s robots and then fled to space. The world is now a desolate and uninhabitable place for most, with dangerous drones running amok. It is up to you to save the city, even though you’re just a nervous cyborg taking out drones one at a time. 

You begin in a run-down workshop located at the outskirts of the city. From there you must fight your way deeper and deeper into the city. 

Collect floppy disks and upgrade your abilities to gain the upper hand in battle! 

Good luck out there!
